fragment.title: Alrik Drive - a mobile app for construction logistics drivers for a TMS company
fragment.desc: As the TMS company Alrik is expanding their users and services, they needed to replace a third-party app for drivers to fully manage the data and be able to improve usability and increase use range of the app.
